resources.string:
Please connect TX/RX in the cradle side firstly,
 then send string to TX,
 and sleep 100ms, 
 try to receive the data from RX
Receive the interrupt from the CRADLE_DET pin,\n When cradle detach from device or attach itself to device,\n this interrupt will take place
Receive the intent from battery service,\n then tell user current power source
